mapper.select: SELECT b_id, writer, title, content, views, thumb_up, reg_date, mod_date, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS rowNum, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.post_id = b_id and c.post_type = 'board') AS cnt_comment FROM board, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) AS R ORDER BY ifnull(mod_date, reg_date) DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(writer, title, content, reg_date) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, utc_timestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, mod_date = utc_timestamp WHERE b_id = #{bid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS listCnt FROM board
